column5: Have found some wrecks in Lake Erie ,using my side scan This one is the Abyssanis 305 foot four masted schooner.She went down in a storm on Oct 18 1917.Home to big bass.   With a little work and Mask and snorkle I have found Big bass heaven
Thats cool and some tank smallies
You found the GOLD treasure that sunk with it.  Nice .
Cool shots Steve of both the wreck and the big smallies
Nice wreck picture!  Even better fish!  Wow.
Amazing stuff!  If you have saved the screenshot of the wreck(s) could you post?  I'm interested to see what they look like...I haven't had good success with my DI as of yet.

Wow, those are giants!  Got some more info on that wreck from http://www.boatnerd.com/swayze/shipwreck/a.htm :   Glad you had the sonar to find it. Would be a shame if you didn't know it was there, dropped an anchor on it, and caused more damage. Not like it's going to be salvaged, but still a shame to wreck a wreck.
That is pretty awesome and I am sure those smallies were a blast to get into.
